title: The extended nonnegative real numbers commutative monoid

blocks.name: xrge0base
blocks.content: The base of the extended nonnegative real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: xrge0plusg
blocks.content: The additive law of the extended nonnegative real numbers monoid is the addition in the extended real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Mar-2017.)

blocks.name: xrge0le
blocks.content: The "less than or equal to" relation in the extended real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Mar-2018.)
